thread.title: BLOCKBUSTER Reports! Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Tweet Review
thread.title_full: BLOCKBUSTER Reports! Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Tweet Review

title: BLOCKBUSTER Reports! Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Tweet Review
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Updated: Thursday, October 15, 2015, 23:44 [IST] 
WHOA! Ram Charan 's Bruce Lee opened up to blockbuster reports from the premiere in Hyderabad. While the premieres and fans shows at the rest of the world are about to begin, the talk is already out. 
Fans and movie buffs, who managed to catch the film at the special premiere in Hyderabad, were all praises for Ram Charan and his new style in the film. 
According to them, Ram Charan will be seen speaking in Telangana accent and his comedy timing was quite a revelation. 
Rakul Preet Singh's characterization stands out surprisingly and Ram Charan's bundle of energy in dances has been celebrated as always. 
However, we would want to keep everything about Chiranjeevi as a surprise but can say you are in store of a real mega feast as informed by a movie buff, who caught up with the show in Prasad's Imax Hyderabad. 
On that note, check out what general audience has to say about the Bruce Lee The Fighter with their tweet reviews, in the slides below. BLOCKBUSTER! Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Tweet Review 1/13 â€” phani kandukuri (@buduggadu) October 15, 2015 Tweets 
Bruce Lee review on the whole. BLOCKBUSTER! Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Tweet Review 2/13
